MonsterTrait.Name: False Appearance
MonsterTrait.Text: Until a stryx speaks or opens its mouth, it is indistinguishable from a normal owl.

MonsterTrait.Name: Flyby
MonsterTrait.Text: The stryx doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The stryx's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can cast the following spell, requiring no components: 3/day: comprehend languages

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Hearing and Sight
MonsterTrait.Text: The stryx has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

MonsterAction.Name: Talons
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.
